channel.title: Iris-Go on Sh4wnZec

item.title: Iris-Go学习笔记
item.description: 安装 错误1 开始学习Go-Iris框架，跟着文档走安装流程 go get github.com/kataras/iris 这一步时，却报错： cannot find package "github.com/russross/blackfriday/v2" in any of: D:\Go\src\github.com\russross\blackfriday\v2 (from $GOROOT) D:\workspace\goproject\src\github.com\russross\blackfriday\v2 (from $GOPATH) cannot find package "github.com/CloudyKit/jet/v4" in any of: D:\Go\src\github.com\CloudyKit\jet\v4 (from $GOROOT) D:\workspace\goproject\src\github.com\CloudyKit\jet\v4 (from $GOPATH) 解决过程 这里提示在 $GOROOT \src\github.com\ 和 $GOPATH \src\github.com 中没有找到对应的包文件，但实际我们只需要
